Description.SourceString: Each Hero has up to four skills: a Basic Skill, a Passive Skill, a Commander Skill, and a Special Skill. Skills are one of the most defining aspects of characters, and many skills are more effective when used in the right combinations.
Description.LocalizedString: Each Hero has up to four skills: a Basic Skill, a Passive Skill, a Commander Skill, and a Special Skill. Skills are one of the most defining aspects of characters, and many skills are more effective when used in the right combinations.
